SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.is_main as isMain, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.item_id as item_id, MIN(s.price_discount) as price_discount FROM items_spec s GROUP BY s.item_id) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
and i.item_name like '%${paramMap.keyword}%'
ORDER BY i.sell_counts desc
ORDER BY tempSpec.price_discount asc
ORDER BY i.item_name asc
